entry.title: Paper Minds
entry.summary:
Author: Mat_Vibes

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,457Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 14

Summary: “There are three sisters,” Jason said. “First one’s all light, gold, and glowing judgment. Angel vibes, zero chill. Her door’s ‘Heaven,’ supposedly. But no one gets in.”“Why not?”Jason shrugged. “You gotta be pure. Like, no regrets, no grudges, no murder—basically, no fun. Blink the wrong way and boom, eternal dial tone.”Dick winced. “Hard pass.”“Second sister’s… invisible. Lives in a void. Her door leads back to the mortal world.”“So how do we find her?”“You don’t. She finds you. But only if the third sister says you can.”“And she is…?”Jason smirked. “Death. Looks like she lost a war with a filing cabinet. Does all the soul paperwork and decides who gets a round trip. She let me out last time.”Dick raised an eyebrow. “Because of your ‘revenge on Batman’ plan?”Jason grinned. “I made it sound poetic. And I had killer eyebrows.” Day 6: Fairytale/Mythology AU | Batman!Dick/Jason | Time/Dimension Travel

entry.title: Under Pressure
entry.summary:
Author: Loric Bard (Chanonvic)

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 897Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 14

Summary: 22:45 - RED HOOD (Hood) arrives at Pier 11 at Gotham Harbor to intercept a delivery of three abducted teenagers [identities REDACTED]. Hood ignores protocol and moves in alone. Hood determines the health of the abductees and sends in a call for back up. NIGHTWING and RED ROBIN (RR) arrive. RR escorts the abductees to safety. Hood and Nightwing disguise themselves and hide in the freight container in the abductees' places. The container is loaded onto the passenger ship The Gentle Lady.23:00 - The Gentle Lady departs Gotham Harbor. Hood and Nightwing await an opportunity to apprehend the two abductors and crew. According to communications relay, Nightwing informed Hood of the countless risks being incurred due to Hood's decision to move in prior to calling in the case. Hood proceeds to utter a string of expletives that is unnecessary to repeat.---Red Hood and Nightwing accidentally get themselves abducted while saving a few victims. While on a sinking ship, it becomes clear to everybody how they feel.

entry.title: Paper Ducks | One Shot
entry.summary:
Author: Mat_Vibes

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,770Chapters: 2/2Kudos: 32

Summary: It all started with a giant penguin.Well, technically, it started with a Penguin warehouse, a trapdoor, a poorly timed pun, and Tim screaming, “Don’t touch that, Dick!” But the point was: the four of them were now stuck in what looked like a mix between a storage cellar and a very deranged villain’s toy box.Jason kicked the wall once and glared at the ceiling. “I told you this job felt too easy. It was a classic setup. Empty warehouse. No guards. One obviously suspicious penguin statue just sitting in the middle. And then this guy—” he pointed dramatically at Dick, “—decides to make a pun.”Dick crossed his arms and raised a brow. “It was a great pun. ‘Waddle we do now?’ It was thematic.” JayDickWeek 2025 Day 5: Reverse Robins | Trapped Together | 5+1 Things

entry.title: 'Til Truth Do Us Part
entry.summary:
Author: LesbianAlien

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,886Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 19

Summary: It's Gotham, but not as you know it.Bruce Wayne's vigilante family has long been at odds with Harvey Dent's mafia family, with Gotham often the victim of their bloody fighting. Through hard work, and heated discussions, eventually a truce was created to prove to Gotham that better times lay ahead - a truce that needed a true union to convince them all.That was how Dent's son and right hand man, Jason Todd, found himself standing at the altar facing his childhood rival, Wayne's first son and crime-fighting partner, Dick Grayson.Who knew 'peace' could be so annoying?-------------------------------------For Day 4 of Jaydick Week 2025.
